Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Garment \Gar"ment\, n. [OE. garnement, OF. garnement, garniment, fr. garnir to garnish. See {Garnish}.] Any article of clothing, as a coat, a gown, etc. [1913 Webster]
No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto old garment. --Matt. ix. 16. [1913 Webster]

garment n : an article of clothing; "garments of the finest silk" v : provide with clothes or put clothes on; "Parents must feed and dress their child" [syn: {dress}, {clothe}, {enclothe}, {garb}, {raiment}, {tog}, {habilitate}, {fit out}, {apparel}] [ant: {undress}]
